website_summaries.verdict: Provides more than adequate pumping power for pool season, though it may have seal problems.
pros: Moves water very well into aboveground pool
No effort needed to open and close strainer basket lid to clean filter
cons: Just adequate for most pools, with pool cleaners running slowly when attached to pump

customer_reviews.title: It works great! If you need a separate vacuum for your ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this replacement motor to use independently to vacuum out my pool. It works great! If you need a separate vacuum for your pool or do not want to use your own filter, I highly recommend making your own. For the price it works great. I hooked up the vacuum hose and discharge hose and ready to go. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Chrisena96706

customer_reviews.title: this pump does a great job. I did not have to alter any ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 1 hp model which pulls about 8 amps to replace the 1.5 hp sta-rite pump which pulled about 12 amps, this pump does a great job. I did not have to alter any hoses to hook up and runs quieter than the old pump. This pump has slightly less suction than the old one but still runs pool vacuum fine. Would recommend this pump as a low cost pool pump replacement
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sommerville

customer_reviews.title: Not a 1 HP replacement
customer_reviews.text: This 1 HP pump is very overrated, no way is this a 1 HP pump it may be 3/4 max. After I installed it to replace my original 1 HP pump my water was green beyond control within a few days. Luckily I caught it soon enough and will be sending the pump back to Amazon. Replaced this one with a Hayward could tell a difference in water flow. Water from the outlet is coming out a lot harder. Don't waste your time and money on this pump. Seems that you get what you pay for with this pump, it's worth spending ana extra 80-100 on a good name brand pump.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Beck

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the filter compartment. It can break off if you miss handle it
customer_reviews.text: Came packed fairly well and installed quickly. The only downfall is that this 1 horsepower pump has half the power as with my other one horsepower motor had. It runs very quiet and smooth. There was nothing in the description as to the RPMs so I think this one's just a little slower because it doesn't push the water like my old Hayward did. I'm using it on a 24 above ground round with a 20 gallon sand filter
customer_reviews.author: Kevin OSullivan

customer_reviews.title: BAD packing caused pump plastic to crack
customer_reviews.text: Pump cracked and does not work. I had planned to return pump but I would have to travel 40 miles. I will return pump. The way pump was packed in box and handled with pump filer bowl facing down may have contributed to cracking of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: very very quiet
customer_reviews.text: installed just a few weeks ago, works well however difficult to find technical info on it...GPMy bad customer support; 800 number does not work from my area, no other alternative to contact, tried email still waiting for support should provide better technical data on product manual and avoid this
customer_reviews.author: waldo

customer_reviews.title: perfect for cleaning green things
customer_reviews.text: i purchased the pump to clean my 'swamp thing' green pool. I experience trouble priming it - tip - with your hose connected and submerged, pour water in the trap basket until air gets pushed out of the hose. i youtubed it. perfect for cleaning green things.
customer_reviews.author: MasterGen

customer_reviews.title: I need to know it is as described
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pump for a client to replace an above ground pump that had finally quit. It was beyond economical repair. This pump is perfect. Almost silent running. Plus it was so easy to changeover. Top or side entry tubing from the jacuzzi. Another great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Trevor Millbank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pump at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great pump for the value! Just wish I could have ordered it with an L5-15 cord. Had to install my own. Super quiet, easy to install and pumps perfectly. Would highly recommend. I did read the other reviews and installed the fitting with the skimmer basket removed just to ensure I didn't crack the housing.
customer_reviews.author: GoodtimesS

customer_reviews.title: Pump
customer_reviews.text: Does not have the discharge pose my old pool pump had at the same HP. I got this one because it said will be delivered July 2, I needed it before the 4th. Then the date changed to the 3rd, then changed again to the 4th then changed to the 5th so we couldn’t use our pool July 4. I watched the tracking, it went from AZ to Ca back to AZ then to NC and then finally here. I’m very frustrated with that.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 1/2months. Wow
customer_reviews.text: Hooked it up in April. It STOPPED working July 11. Two and one half months?? Seriously don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump a year ago and it didn't make it even one season before it started leaking between the strainer and pump housings. Trying to figure out how to tighten the small gap. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Not 1hp, actually 2/3 hp
customer_reviews.text: Rated as 1 hp, but it is not. Actually it runs at 490 watts which is 2/3 hp. Good value for the money if 2/3 hp will work for you. Just don't expect a full 1 horsepower from this unit.
customer_reviews.author: P. CaffallDavis

customer_reviews.title: It worked great for 2 hard years
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these for an In ground pool set up for above ground equipment in June 2017, it runs continuously about 10 hours per day all year. It’s a vacation rental so the pool is also heated so that 80 degrees is maintained at all times. Bearings are finally getting noisy, in part because of me, so today I am buying another pump, this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Faster to get to clean
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the pump that came with the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Praisepays

customer_reviews.title: Self priming not reliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought the pump to vacuum the pool and its ability to self-prime. The suction for self priming is very weak. I will not recommend if you are using the pump to vacuum your pool.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Wong

customer_reviews.title: Quietest PUMP in 20+ years
customer_reviews.text: Quiet - that' all you need to know. Great low price (maybe not the most suction) - low price and quiet - !!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Formosa

customer_reviews.title: This pump works great so far and is once again quiet
customer_reviews.text: Last pump that was an older model of this one started squealing very loudly. Could find the ceramic bearing to repair it so I replaced. This pump works great so far and is once again quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Less $$$
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for the 1hp Hayward matrix which is close to $200. Has top or side outflow port definitely quieter than the Hayward. Can't speak to longevity yet only a few days in use. The Hayward I'm replacing lasted only 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: mobetter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This pump has been running non stop all summer long, we have had zero issues with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Product worked great for 4 days
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great for 4 days, then we went on vacation for 3 weeks and pump wasn't used, came home and pump was giving a problem turning on, every third or forth time turning on we had to bang on motor to get to start. Now return window is closed, so we can't even send back!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great pump. Moves all water in a 24 foot round pool.
customer_reviews.text: Great pump for our pool. Very quiet and has great suction.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Very good filter motor For one horse power and it works great
customer_reviews.author: gerard cianci

customer_reviews.title: Pressure is lower than my old 1hp Hayward, BUT ...
customer_reviews.text: Pressure is lower than my old 1hp Hayward, BUT it's very quiet and my pool has never been cleaner, go figure. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: David N.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: This pump sucks!! I continually have algae and the ONLY reason is this pump.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley0566

customer_reviews.title: Good Pump
customer_reviews.text: The pump works smoothly and is powerful. I wish it had a shutoff valve prior to the trap or a handle on the top of the trap lid to make it easier to clean it out but, this is the typical design. I have had no problems with the pump over the last year.
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: This item is very disappointing. It does not have ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is very disappointing. It does not have the power it claims to have. I had to by a replacement for my pool because this one did not work well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gurgle gurgle gurgle
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't always self prime - needs quite a bit of encouragement. But once it gets going it pumps quite a lot of water.
customer_reviews.author: AJN

customer_reviews.title: Great pump,  and very quiet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a 3/4hp Hayward pump that finally went and I love it. This pump is powerful and extremely quiet. Love it. I'd recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Don't wast ya money
customer_reviews.text: Had it not even three months and it went out and they don't do a replacement for it don't wast ya money with this pump it's not worth the time or your hard earned money
customer_reviews.author: Justin scruggs

customer_reviews.title: Better & Stronger than my original.
customer_reviews.text: I did not want to buy this type of product online, but with a 30 return policy, figured to try it. It's quiet and pumps more water than the original pump ever did... The price was 1/4 of what local stores wanted. It arrived ahead of schedule... The shaft cover was a plus... I have found a great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: L'Italiano

customer_reviews.title: Works great on in ground pool.
customer_reviews.text: Works great on in ground above ground pool (10, 000 gal.) bolted in place and fittings worked just like the old one that failed. Good price. Less than the cost of repairing the old pump. Junk is meant to be replaced, not repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Skeeter Hater

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice easy replacement. Also, it was far more efficient than the one that it replaced. I'd highly recommend and I am happy that I didn't try and just replace the motor on the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: this was just plug and play. the adapters it came with and a hose clamp was all I needed. plugged it up to the pool timer set the time and its been running for 2 months now more power then the oem pump
customer_reviews.author: bert

customer_reviews.title: Pump power
customer_reviews.text: Power of pump is not as strong as other 1 hp pump this replaced. This is a 1 hp pump and seems like perhaps a 3/4 hp. Other than that it is very quiet and still does the job very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: quiet and efficient had to check to see if it was running it was so quiet.
customer_reviews.author: L. Breech

customer_reviews.title: Works well as a replacement pump to our above ground ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well as a replacement pump to our above ground Kayak pool. My husband had to modify it a bit to fit the direction of the tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K Wojcik

customer_reviews.title: easy to return though
customer_reviews.text: Stooped working after 2 weeks....easy to return though....didnt feel as powerful as my 3 l 4 hp Haywood
customer_reviews.author: Stefanos Martimianakis

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with it so far
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it on Thursday it arrived on Saturday. Very pleased with it so far. Our winter cover had started falling apart in the Spring and tons of teeny tiny black pieces of cover was in the water we thought we were going to have to drain the pool and start over but we vacuumed once using socks on the end of our cheapy vacuum as a filter and ran the pump a couple of days. The water is now crystal clear. The pump did a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Davis

customer_reviews.title: Quieter.
customer_reviews.text: Much quieter than the same size Hayward it replaced. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Quaid

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price, but is is no way shape of form self-priming.
customer_reviews.author: Chasser

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT LAST
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump 10 months ago and today it has decided to quit doing its job. It's running but is not circulating the water.
customer_reviews.author: sarah thibodaux

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: The pump matched up to the the filter and motor bolted right on with no problems
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain
customer_reviews.text: Not too loud and is doing well replacing our worn out pentair 1hp pump.Good price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best pumps I have had for my 7
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pumps I have had for my 7,5000 18 foot round pool. By far it is the quietest!. Beats the brand names I was using previously.
customer_reviews.author: D. Oh

customer_reviews.title: This pump seems pretty quiet but the picture shows and the description states ...
customer_reviews.text: This pump seems pretty quiet but the picture shows and the description states that the pump has a horizontal and vertical discharge, the one I received only had a vertical discharge. They need to change the picture and description.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Adapted to my old pump great. Works well. I would have perferred 1.5hp but the 1hp works great with my 15x30 above ground pool.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Farrelly

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and strong
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an very old pump with this one and can't beleve how quiet it is.And yes strong all so. It was a great price so it gets my A OK statment.
customer_reviews.author: Olivan M. Leach

customer_reviews.title: pool pump
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Would purchase again if need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Pump broke in 45 days
customer_reviews.text: I am an accomplished irrigation professional. This pump broke in 45 days flat. It was on a 8hr/day cycle with minimum load.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M.

customer_reviews.title: works very well
customer_reviews.text: The only down side i have found is that it does not work well with using a pool vac. The catch basket clogs heavily when used with a pool vac, and the manufacturer does not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: bls

customer_reviews.title: A good price, motor is water proof
customer_reviews.text: ... A good price,motor is water proof, overall fits our needs, But the 1 HP. doesn't have the same amount of power as the 1 HP it replaced... Takes longer to clean the pool, and the Aqua bug cleaner does not have the same power to clean the bottom, also have to backflush more often to maintain circulation...
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: This is more quiet than our old one.. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is more quiet than our old one ....only down side is you have to unplugto backwash, etc when cleaning pool!
customer_reviews.author: Harleygrl

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!! Do not waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy!!!! I bought this item October 2014 the motor has blown in May 2015!!!! Didn't even make it to the summer now I have to purchase another motor.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Mccray

customer_reviews.title: Great Pump Motor
customer_reviews.text: I have used this motor for two years now and it works great. I would buy it again if I needed another one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chavers

customer_reviews.title: The Blue Wave NE6151B Maxi replacement pump was easy to install on my doughboy pool
customer_reviews.text: The Blue Wave NE6151B Maxi replacement pump was easy to install on my doughboy pool. Runs quieter than my old pump.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This pump is excellent fit exactly where the other one was. Quick delivery I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Mark DeBiase

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute crap...It worked for 1 week. I received it Oct 2015 but it was too cold to swim so I didn't even take it out of the box to install it until March 2016.. but even though it has a 1 year warranty...Amazon will not accept it as a return... it has to be repaired....I am buying another brand instead of waiting months for it to be repaired. Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: works like a champ. no issues with pool since installing
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: third pump
customer_reviews.text: First came with the pool, froze in the winter (my fault). Then my previous hayward worked for 2 years then suddenly died - not my fault. This one came with all the optional attachments for hoses. $138 seems like a very good price compared to others. It Is very quiet (more quiet than my previous 2). Basket works well too, the hayward did not easily turn to open - this one does. Pumps well too. Fingers crossed I am not writing a review on my 4th pump in couple years!
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: excellent service and product
customer_reviews.text: Met or passed my expectation. Delivery very prompt, next day. Pump is very quiet better than original Hayward. Will update after more use.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Nice pump
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Like the water tight design for rust protection. Much quieter than my older more expensive pump. Would give it a 5 star if I knew the longevity of it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheddjr

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Much less volume than my previous pump which was rated the same. Works well. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: RPM

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Only used it for about 3 weeks before ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Only used it for about 3 weeks before shutting down for the winter, but I would definitely recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H

customer_reviews.title: but is good for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: The product is not as strong as the specs, but is good for my purpose. There is no On/Off switch. Shipping is on time. I just own this pump a bout a week and only use it once so I don't know it is going to last long or not.
customer_reviews.author: H T

customer_reviews.title: Replacement pool pump
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied, motor works very well. It is so quiet I have to double check to make sure it is running.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnyonthespot

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Replacement
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a replacement for a pump that came with our pool. Once i got the right pipe fittings set up and the electric hooked up this is an amazing pump that is incredibly quite. My only complaint is the power chord it comes with it is only 6 feet and there is no Ground Fault Circuit interrupter. I took the old one of our old pump and put it on the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen and Latrell

customer_reviews.title: Replacement pump works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well and is very quiet but was much more difficult to install then I expected. The conversion to 110 from 220 was more then I could handle. I had to hire an electrician.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: As Described not overstated
customer_reviews.text: Wow using on inground and still primes itself. Product is as described. Basket is oversize and newer Hayward lids actually fit. Don't know about longevity will update at 6 months. UPDATE; still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the money it is a great replacement pump I would definetly purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen L Czajka

customer_reviews.title: it would have been nice if the pump had instead of the cage leaf catcher .... room for a standard cartridge filter
customer_reviews.text: It seems sturdy ... well made, however I really was looking for not only a pump but a filter .... and the plastic cage will maybe catch larger leaves ... which rarely are sucked into it anyhow. Plenty of power, but it would have been nice if the pump had instead of the cage leaf catcher .... room for a standard cartridge filter
customer_reviews.author: O. Benet

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a Haywood that was a few years old and this pump is much better I'm very happy I went with this pump highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: chris seymore

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly... Works great so far... Only running for a week or so.. Very happy with how quiet it is..
customer_reviews.author: JIllyn

customer_reviews.title: Great pump for the price
customer_reviews.text: Solid pump. Superior to my old one. Exceeded my expectations for the price. Did have to buy a MASSIVE Crescent wrench to properly tighten the threaded adapters, but having a giant wrench/mace is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Riordan

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Pump, RIP 5/29/14-6/10/17
customer_reviews.text: Going on my 2nd season and works like a champ! It's much quieter than my old Hayward unit. RIP 5/29/14-6/10/17
customer_reviews.author: Jason LaCroix

customer_reviews.title: Nice and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Nice and quiet... Easy hook up for my above ground Intex Pool... Was happy to see fittings and Teflon tape included...
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Short term fix
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal! Almost half the price than the pool store in town. GREAT! Except it only worked for 1 month. Then it made a cough, spit some smoke, and died. We had to go to the pool supply anyway. Could have saved a few dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pump of all pumps
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pump to replace my 10 year old Hayward that finally failed. This pump is actually easier to open and close the strainer basket than the original Hayward, the output power is about the same or greater, motor is nice and quiet. I have used this all summer, and it runs perfectly. If it lasts half as long as the hayward, I will be happy. You can't beat this pump for the price..........Thanks Amazon !
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pump for medium size above ground pools
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this pump as a replacement for a relative's pool. It was a great price and works very well to circulate the water in a 24' round above ground pool. A slightly bigger pump (1.5HP) would work a little better for larger pools and not stress the pump out as much. This pump is fairly quiet and easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: The best part is the price was great and I received ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and is very quiet. The best part is the price was great and I received it so quickly! Would highly recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Manz

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: After 3 weeks of use, the pump stuck and no run.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered Swim Time NE6151B, Doheny Enterprizes, Inc ( ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Swim Time NE6151B, Doheny Enterprizes, Inc ( Pool Supplies Superstore ) sent Ningbo Tuozhan 1hp pump . Refused to place VALID Warranty on the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Arman

customer_reviews.title: Ok replacement but...
customer_reviews.text: same posted horsepower as my old unit , but not as powerful in actuality. still a very good replacement and works well.
customer_reviews.author: John Carter Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Half of local pool store. Works great. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Sierzenga

customer_reviews.title: good pump just dont expect it to work like a brand name
customer_reviews.text: received this pump quickly, like the design, its quiet... and thats where the good ends. the problem with this pump is that it does not move even half the water of my 1hp pentair pump which means its usless for my pool i emailed the seller stating my issue and that i would like to exchange it for a 1.5 hp and was told that comparing brands of pumps is like comparing apples to oranges and the dont have any 1.5 hp in stock. end of email... needless to say very disappointed. long story short spend a few more dollars and get a hayward....
customer_reviews.author: jeremy schmelzle

customer_reviews.title: Great pump for medium size pool...
customer_reviews.text: This pump moves a lot of water, pretty fast. It was easy to set up and mount. The cover over the filter section is much easier to remove and replace than the one it replaced. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet and very powerful. Not too bad on price either. Will get another if this one fails as well
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Williams

customer_reviews.title: The first pump died within two weeks of use. ...
customer_reviews.text: The first pump died within two weeks of use. The second pump seems to be ok... I have currently had it cycling for two weeks and no issue with this one so far!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Morin

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied so far
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about this pump because of its price compared to others, but it works well and is very quiet. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rica Bilko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast and it works great so much quieter than my Hayward. Easy to install
customer_reviews.author: matthew hartman

customer_reviews.title: Great pump
customer_reviews.text: The pump is great and a reasonable price. We have been very happy with it so far. I would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Leaking. Non-universal fittings. Returned.
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't stop leaking even with caulking. Fittings were not standard for above ground pools. Could not find adapters or hose fittings at home depot, pool supply or plumbing supply. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Nyshia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Is quieter than my last pump
customer_reviews.text: It has been running for about two months now and is working good. My last pump was actually 1.5 HP but this one is working fine on our 24 foot round pool.
customer_reviews.author: C. H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got here on time and seems to be working fine.. :)
customer_reviews.author: Betty Jo Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pump works great. It is quite and very easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: very good price for a pool pump. Used it all summer with no issues. Runs quietly, and pumps like should. Fittings are setup for multi use with different types of plumbing. Has a skimmer basket to remove debris before it enters the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Very quite
customer_reviews.text: This pump has been extremely quite and runs great. Not to mention that the installation was extremely easy and worked perfect with all my old equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dake

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: works well for my 24' round above ground swimming pool. I just wish there was a on/off switch.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Works great and quiet. Can replace 3 times for the cost of a brand name pump at the pool store. Seems to have the same quality build as well. More than enough power and volume for 18 foot round above ground pool.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Lowry

customer_reviews.title: should've bought a Hayward
customer_reviews.text: all the specs are the same as the original Hayward pump I had before. but this pump clearly lacks the power the Hayward has. wish I would've bought a hayward
customer_reviews.author: david slater

product_meta.title: Blue Wave NE6151B Maxi Replacement Pump for Above Ground Pools,1 HP,Black
product_meta.description: Same quality as Hayward, Sta-Rite and Pentair, with dual port dishcharge! These powerful Maxi Replacement Pumps for Above Ground pools feature corrosion proof polymer construction that will deliver years of reliable service. This high performance pump is quiet, efficient and self priming. Top (vertical) discharge design fits most filters and the extra large clear lid allows for easy cleaning. Replace your old inefficient pump with this water moving dynamo. Comes with 6-ft cord—110v. Available in two sizes: 1 HP or 1.5 HP pumps Bullet feature 1 (optional) : Durable polymer construction that resists corrosion; Same quality as Hayward, Sta-Rite and Pentair
